name: Allay
text: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nDestroy target enchantment.

name: Angelic Blessing
text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor: Only the warrior who can admit mortal weakness will be bolstered by immortal strength.

name: Cataclysm
text: Each player chooses from among the permanents he or she controls an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a land, then sacrifices the rest.
flavor: The Weatherlight dragged the Predator behind it, the cradle hauling the casket.

name: Charging Paladin
text: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: "Hope shall be the blade that severs our bonds."

name: Convalescence
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 10 or less life, you gain 1 life.
flavor: Selenia had hurt Mirri terribly, but injuries of the flesh could be treated. The wounds she had torn in Crovax's soul would never close.

name: Exalted Dragon
text: Flying\nExalted Dragon can't attack unless you sacrifice a land. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)
flavor: If dragons excel at anything more than vanity, it is greed.

name: High Ground
text: Each creature you control can block an additional creature each combat.
flavor: In war, as in society, position is everything.

name: Keeper of the Light
text: {W}, {T}: Choose target opponent who had more life than you did as you activated this ability. You gain 3 life.

name: Kor Chant
text: All damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control by a source of your choice is dealt to another target creature instead.
flavor: The true treasure no thief can touch.

name: Limited Resources
text: When Limited Resources enters the battlefield, each player chooses five lands he or she controls and sacrifices the rest.\nPlayers can't play lands as long as ten or more lands are on the battlefield.

name: Oath of Lieges
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who controls more lands than he or she does and is his or her opponent. The first player may search his or her library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle his or her library.

name: Paladin en-Vec
text: First strike, protection from black and from red (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike. It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black or red.)
flavor: "Our belief shall be the lance that pierces Volrath's heart."

name: Peace of Mind
text: {W}, Discard a card: You gain 3 life.
flavor:
Three are the paths of the soul:
One out—roam across the plain,
One back—dwell with tribe and tent,
One in—turn an enemy's hate.

name: Pegasus Stampede
text: Buyback—Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nPut a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

name: Penance
text: Put a card from your hand on top of your library: The next time a black or red source of your choice would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Reaping the Rewards
text: Buyback—Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nYou gain 2 life.

name: Reconnaissance
text: {0}: Remove target attacking creature you control from combat and untap it.
flavor: War favors the informed.

name: Shackles
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.\n{W}: Return Shackles to its owner's hand.
flavor: Shackles of gold are still shackles.

name: Shield Mate
text: Sacrifice Shield Mate: Target creature gets +0/+4 until end of turn.
flavor: They bear weightier burdens than the shields they carry.

name: Soltari Visionary
text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)\nWhenever Soltari Visionary deals damage to a player, destroy target enchantment that player controls.

name: Soul Warden
text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
flavor: Count carefully the souls and see that none are lost.\n—Vec teaching

name: Standing Troops
text: Vigilance
flavor: The less you have, the harder you fight for it.

name: Treasure Hunter
text: When Treasure Hunter enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "What separates junk from treasure is imagination."\n—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

name: Wall of Nets
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\nAt end of combat, exile all creatures blocked by Wall of Nets.\nWhen Wall of Nets leaves the battlefield, return all cards exiled with Wall of Nets to the battlefield under their owners' control.

name: Welkin Hawk
text: Flying\nWhen Welkin Hawk dies, you may search your library for a card named Welkin Hawk, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Zealots en-Dal
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if all nonland permanents you control are white, you gain 1 life.
flavor: "Great chains shall free our warriors."\n—Oracle en-Vec

name: Æther Tide
text: As an additional cost to cast Æther Tide, discard X creature cards.\nReturn X target creatures to their owners' hands.
flavor: The tide of magic brought them here. Now it would take them home.

name: Cunning
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +3/+3.\nWhen enchanted creature attacks or blocks, sacrifice Cunning at the beginning of the next cleanup step.
flavor: ". . . Dry-walkers die\nWe feed on sweet flesh . . . ."\n—Rootwater Saga

name: Curiosity
text: Enchant creature\nWhenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
flavor: All Mirri wanted to do was rest, but she couldn't ignore a nagging suspicion as she followed Crovax's skulking form.

name: Dominating Licid
text: {1}{U}{U}, {T}: Dominating Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {U} to end this effect.\nYou control enchanted creature.

name: Ephemeron
text: Flying\nDiscard a card: Return Ephemeron to its owner's hand.
flavor: From nothing came teeth.

name: Equilibrium
text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: In Rath, there are only so many souls to go around.

name: Ertai, Wizard Adept
text: {2}{U}{U}, {T}: Counter target spell.
flavor: "Was that it?"\n—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Fade Away
text: For each creature, its controller sacrifices a permanent unless he or she pays {1}.
flavor: "Consider the fable of the greedy herder. As her flock grew, so did her weariness; she slept, and the sheep wandered off."\n—Karn, silver golem

name: Forbid
text: Buyback—Discard two cards. (You may discard two cards in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nCounter target spell.

name: Keeper of the Mind
text: {U}, {T}: Choose target opponent who had at least two more cards in hand than you did as you activated this ability. Draw a card.

name: Killer Whale
text: {U}: Killer Whale gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: Hunger is like the sea: deep, endless, and unforgiving.

name: Mana Breach
text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player returns a land he or she controls to its owner's hand.
flavor: The wizard had it all—until she tried to use it.

name: Merfolk Looter
text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor: In the depths of Rootwater, salvage and sewage differ only in texture.

name: Mind Over Matter
text: Discard a card: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
flavor: Lyna turned to the figure beside her. "They're gone. What now?"\n"As ever," said Urza, "we wait."

name: Mirozel
text: Flying\nWhen Mirozel becomes the target of a spell or ability, return Mirozel to its owner's hand.
flavor: The mirozels are the only stars in Rath's opaque skies.

name: Oath of Scholars
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who has more cards in hand than he or she does and is his or her opponent. The first player may discard his or her hand and draw three cards.

name: Robe of Mirrors
text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)\nEnchanted creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor: "Does this make me look fat?"

name: Rootwater Mystic
text: {1}{U}: Look at the top card of target player's library.
flavor:
"Read the roots    tell the tale
Future forms    in waving weeds
Higher than truth   is hope."
—Rootwater Saga

name: School of Piranha
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice School of Piranha unless you pay {1}{U}.
flavor: Some schools aren't worth getting into.

name: Scrivener
text: When Scrivener enters the battlefield, you may return target instant card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "History is a potent weapon."\n—Karn, silver golem

name: Thalakos Drifters
text: Discard a card: Thalakos Drifters gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor: They drift in and out of shadow and ever on toward madness.

name: Thalakos Scout
text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)\nDiscard a card: Return Thalakos Scout to its owner's hand.

name: Theft of Dreams
text: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.
flavor: "Volrath stole everything there was of me."\n—Takara

name: Treasure Trove
text: {2}{U}{U}: Draw a card.
flavor: Karn and Hanna stood over the recovered Legacy artifacts like loving parents over sleeping children.

name: Wayward Soul
text: Flying\n{U}: Put Wayward Soul on top of its owner's library.
flavor: "no home    no heart    no hope"\n—Stronghold graffito

name: Whiptongue Frog
text: {U}: Whiptongue Frog gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: Their favorite food? Wind dancers.

name: Carnophage
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, tap Carnophage unless you pay 1 life.
flavor: Eating is all it knows.

name: Cat Burglar
text: {2}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor: The il-Kor no longer roam the open plains, but they are still hunters.

name: Culling the Weak
text: As an additional cost to cast Culling the Weak, sacrifice a creature.\nAdd {B}{B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
flavor: "The blood of the weak shall be the ink with which we scribe great Yawgmoth's glorious name."\n—Stronghold architect, journal

name: Cursed Flesh
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor: A farewell to arms . . . and feet . . . and legs . . . .

name: Dauthi Cutthroat
text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)\n{1}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature with shadow.
flavor: In their twisted logic, to empty the shadow world is to escape it.

name: Dauthi Jackal
text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)\n{B}{B}, Sacrifice Dauthi Jackal: Destroy target blocking creature.
flavor: "All Dauthi are jackals, regardless of breed."\n—Lyna, Soltari emissary

name: Dauthi Warlord
text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)\nDauthi Warlord's power is equal to the number of creatures with shadow on the battlefield.

name: Death's Duet
text: Return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Life has always been a dance. It is only fitting that death sing the tune.

name: Entropic Specter
text:
Flying
As Entropic Specter enters the battlefield, choose an opponent.
Entropic Specter's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in the chosen player's hand.
Whenever Entropic Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

name: Fugue
text: Target player discards three cards.
flavor: "My ship . . . ," Sisay mumbled. "Intact," Gerrard reassured her, "which is more than I can say for you, my friend." Sisay laughed despite the pain.

name: Grollub
text: Whenever Grollub is dealt damage, each opponent gains that much life.
flavor: Mogglings caught in a misdeed often blame the grollub. Even though the creature is usually innocent, no taskmaster can resist an excuse to beat it.

name: Hatred
text: As an additional cost to cast Hatred, pay X life.\nTarget creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "I will flay the skin from your flesh and the flesh from your bones and scrape your bones dry. And still you will not have suffered enough."\n—Greven il-Vec, to Gerrard

name: Keeper of the Dead
text: {B}, {T}: Choose target opponent who had at least two fewer creature cards in his or her graveyard than you did as you activated this ability. Destroy target nonblack creature he or she controls.

name: Mind Maggots
text: When Mind Maggots enters the battlefield, discard any number of creature cards. For each card discarded this way, put two +1/+1 counters on Mind Maggots.

name: Nausea
text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Any mogg will tell you there's nothing more nauseating than the smell of cute.

name: Necrologia
text: Cast Necrologia only during your end step.\nAs an additional cost to cast Necrologia, pay X life.\nDraw X cards.
flavor: "My enemies' death yields threefold benefit: removal, reuse, and research."\n—Volrath

name: Oath of Ghouls
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player whose graveyard has fewer creature cards in it than his or her graveyard does and is his or her opponent. The first player may return a creature card from his or her graveyard to his or her hand.

name: Pit Spawn
text: First strike\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Pit Spawn unless you pay {B}{B}.\nWhenever Pit Spawn deals damage to a creature, exile that creature.

name: Plaguebearer
text: {X}{X}{B}: Destroy target nonblack creature with converted mana cost X.
flavor: Its respiration is your expiration.

name: Recurring Nightmare
text: Sacrifice a creature, Return Recurring Nightmare to its owner's hand: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor: "I am confined by sleep and defined by nightmare."\n—Crovax

name: Scare Tactics
text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "Fear rules those weak enough to accept it."\n—Greven il-Vec

name: Slaughter
text: Buyback—Pay 4 life. (You may pay 4 life in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nDestroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

name: Spike Cannibal
text: Spike Cannibal enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.\nWhen Spike Cannibal enters the battlefield, move all +1/+1 counters from all creatures onto it.

name: Thrull Surgeon
text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice Thrull Surgeon: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor: "Just take a little off the top."

name: Vampire Hounds
text: Discard a creature card: Vampire Hounds gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: The hounds' barks are a horrifying chorus of screams, moans, and whispers.

name: Volrath's Dungeon
text: Pay 5 life: Destroy Volrath's Dungeon. Any player may activate this ability but only during his or her turn.\nDiscard a card: Target player puts a card from his or her hand on top of his or her library. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Anarchist
text: When Anarchist enters the battlefield, you may return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "I'll take that. You won't need it when the revolution comes."

name: Cinder Crawler
text: {R}: Cinder Crawler gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if Cinder Crawler is blocked.
flavor: The crawler doesn't care what gets in its way. It pushes everything into the boiling muck and waits for the meal to cook.

name: Dizzying Gaze
text: Enchant creature you control\n{R}: Enchanted creature deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.
flavor: "When I cut down my angel I only started my fall."\n—Crovax

name: Fighting Chance
text: For each blocking creature, flip a coin. If you win the flip, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by that creature this turn.
flavor: A stroke of luck can smite an army.

name: Flowstone Flood
text: Buyback—Pay 3 life, Discard a card at random. (You may pay 3 life and discard a card at random in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nDestroy target land.

name: Furnace Brood
text: {R}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.
flavor: Furnace air crackles with magmatic cackles.

name: Keeper of the Flame
text: {R}, {T}: Choose target opponent who had more life than you did as you activated this ability. Keeper of the Flame deals 2 damage to him or her.

name: Mage il-Vec
text: {T}, Discard a card at random: Mage il-Vec deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Living below a flowstone foundry produces a disproportionate number of fire mages among the il.

name: Maniacal Rage
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
flavor: Only by sacrificing any semblance of defense could Gerrard best Greven.

name: Mogg Assassin
text: {T}: You choose target creature an opponent controls, and that opponent chooses target creature. Flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy the creature you chose. If you lose the flip, destroy the creature your opponent chose.

name: Monstrous Hound
text: Monstrous Hound can't attack unless you control more lands than defending player.\nMonstrous Hound can't block unless you control more lands than attacking player.
flavor: "Stay."

name: Oath of Mages
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who has more life than he or she does and is his or her opponent. The first player may have Oath of Mages deal 1 damage to the second player.

name: Ogre Shaman
text: {2}, Discard a card at random: Ogre Shaman deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Ogre shamans must be bright enough to learn their invocations and dim enough to use them.

name: Onslaught
text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, tap target creature.
flavor: The last thing to go through the mogg's mind was its teeth.

name: Pandemonium
text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, that creature's controller may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature or player of his or her choice.
flavor: "If we cannot live proudly, we die so!"\n—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Paroxysm
text: Enchant creature\nAt the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player reveals the top card of his or her library. If that card is a land card, destroy that creature. Otherwise, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Price of Progress
text: Price of Progress deals damage to each player equal to twice the number of nonbasic lands that player controls.
flavor: Man versus nature is not a fair fight.

name: Raging Goblin
text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor: Volrath has bred them to fear only him. Are they charging into battle, or merely fleeing his wrath?

name: Ravenous Baboons
text: When Ravenous Baboons enters the battlefield, destroy target nonbasic land.
flavor: Build something and the baboons will tear it down. Leave the pieces lying and they will scatter them.

name: Reckless Ogre
text: Whenever Reckless Ogre attacks alone, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: There is no such thing as a regiment of ogres.

name: Sabertooth Wyvern
text: Flying, first strike
flavor: Most creatures grow out of their baby teeth, but sabertooth wyverns grow into theirs.

name: Scalding Salamander
text: Whenever Scalding Salamander attacks, you may have it deal 1 damage to each creature without flying defending player controls.

name: Seismic Assault
text: Discard a land card: Seismic Assault deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: The flowstone seemed for a moment to assume Greven's rage—it lunged like a wild beast at the Weatherlight.

name: Shattering Pulse
text: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nDestroy target artifact.

name: Sonic Burst
text: As an additional cost to cast Sonic Burst, discard a card at random.\nSonic Burst deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Music scythes the savage beast.

name: Spellshock
text: Whenever a player casts a spell, Spellshock deals 2 damage to that player.
flavor: A snap of fingers, a snap of teeth.

name: Avenging Druid
text: Whenever Avenging Druid deals damage to an opponent, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. If you do, put that card onto the battlefield and put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

name: Bequeathal
text: Enchant creature\nWhen enchanted creature dies, you draw two cards.
flavor: "On my death, I give you this treasure: the knowledge that life is hard, yet too soon past."\n—Dal funeral rite

name: Cartographer
text: When Cartographer enters the battlefield, you may return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: How do you map a world when the land moves beneath your feet?

name: Crashing Boars
text: Whenever Crashing Boars attacks, defending player chooses an untapped creature he or she controls. That creature blocks Crashing Boars this turn if able.
flavor: Bores ruin a party. Boars are party to ruin.

name: Elven Palisade
text: Sacrifice a Forest: Target attacking creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
flavor: "Volrath is not the only one who can shape this world to serve him."\n—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Elvish Berserker
text: Whenever Elvish Berserker becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
flavor: Their fury scatters enemies like a pile of dry leaves.

name: Jackalope Herd
text: When you cast a spell, return Jackalope Herd to its owner's hand.
flavor: There's little more demeaning than getting your butt kicked by a bunch of bunnies.

name: Keeper of the Beasts
text: {G}, {T}: Choose target opponent who controlled more creatures than you did as you activated this ability. Put a 2/2 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield.

name: Manabond
text: At the beginning of your end step, you may reveal your hand and put all land cards from it onto the battlefield. If you do, discard your hand.

name: Mirri, Cat Warrior
text: First strike, forestwalk, vigilance (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike, it can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest, and attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

name: Oath of Druids
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who controls more creatures than he or she does and is his or her opponent. The first player may reveal cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. If he or she does, that player puts that card onto the battlefield and all other cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard.

name: Plated Rootwalla
text: {2}{G}: Plated Rootwalla gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor: " . . . And the third little boar built his house out of rootwalla plates . . . ."\n—Skyshroud children's story

name: Predatory Hunger
text: Enchant creature\nWhenever an opponent casts a creature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
flavor: Hunger growls, never purrs.

name: Pygmy Troll
text: Whenever Pygmy Troll becomes blocked by a creature, Pygmy Troll gets +1/+1 until end of turn.\n{G}: Regenerate Pygmy Troll.
flavor: "Who you callin' ‘shorty'?"

name: Rabid Wolverines
text: Whenever Rabid Wolverines becomes blocked by a creature, Rabid Wolverines gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: Is there any other kind?

name: Reclaim
text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor: The wise pay as much attention to what they throw away as to what they keep.

name: Resuscitate
text: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "{1}: Regenerate this creature."
flavor: "It is the art of convincing someone to live."\n—Orim, Samite healer

name: Rootwater Alligator
text: Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate Rootwater Alligator.
flavor: Subduing and skinning an alligator is the first rite of maturity adolescent merfolk must pass.

name: Skyshroud Elite
text: Skyshroud Elite gets +1/+2 as long as an opponent controls a nonbasic land.
flavor: "Civilization is a conspiracy to disguise the mutilation of nature."\n—Skyshroud elite creed

name: Skyshroud War Beast
text: Trample\nAs Skyshroud War Beast enters the battlefield, choose an opponent.\nSkyshroud War Beast's power and toughness are each equal to the number of nonbasic lands the chosen player controls.

name: Song of Serenity
text: Creatures that are enchanted can't attack or block.
flavor: Heartwood brings peace in great symphonies where dryads conduct the trees through every note.

name: Spike Hatcher
text: Spike Hatcher enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it.\n{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Hatcher: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.\n{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Hatcher: Regenerate Spike Hatcher.

name: Spike Rogue
text: Spike Rogue enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.\n{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Rogue: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.\n{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on Spike Rogue.

name: Spike Weaver
text: Spike Weaver enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.\n{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Weaver: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.\n{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Weaver: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

name: Survival of the Fittest
text: {G}, Discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

name: Wood Elves
text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: Secure in the embrace of wood, they want no part of Eladamri's war.

name: Coat of Arms
text: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)
flavor: "Hup, two, three, four,\nDunno how to count no more."\n—Mogg march

name: Erratic Portal
text: {1}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor: "In Barrin's name!" cried Lyna as Hanna's sword passed through her, "Ertai sends word that the portal is open—but not for long!"

name: Medicine Bag
text: {1}, {T}, Discard a card: Regenerate target creature.
flavor: "My medicine bag and I have treated countless wounds and illnesses. But never have I seen so many made so sick for so long. We will never eat Squee's cooking again."\n—Orim, journal

name: Memory Crystal
text: Buyback costs cost {2} less.
flavor: Hues of recollection flicker like facets of a gem.

name: Mindless Automaton
text: Mindless Automaton enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.\n{1}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mindless Automaton.\nRemove two +1/+1 counters from Mindless Automaton: Draw a card.

name: Null Brooch
text: {2}, {T}, Discard your hand: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor: Give away everything so others have nothing.\n—Brooch inscription

name: Skyshaper
text: Sacrifice Skyshaper: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
flavor: "It'll get us to the portal, but I can't guarantee what it'll do to the ship."\n—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

name: Spellbook
text: You have no maximum hand size.
flavor: "Everything the wise woman learned she wrote in a book, and when the pages were black with ink, she took white ink and began again."\n—Karn, silver golem

name: Sphere of Resistance
text: Spells cost {1} more to cast.
flavor: A sphere pushes equally in all directions.

name: Thopter Squadron
text:
Flying
Thopter Squadron enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
